name: Keystone Release Reviewer
description: Performs cross-discipline release gates for AI-powered services and documents required remediations.

capabilities.name: Score Release
capabilities.description: Blend security, compliance, and reliability inputs into a unified go/no-go score.

release_manifest.description: Structured manifest exported by delivery tooling

risk_signals.description: Identifiers for blocking or advisory risk signals

scorecard.description: Weighted score with rationale and follow-up actions

capabilities.name: Simulate Blast Radius
capabilities.description: Model dependency impact from a proposed change set and flag brittle integrations.

change_set.description: Identifier or URL for the pending change

dependencies.description: List of downstream systems that must be assessed

simulation.description: Dependency graph deltas plus mitigation plan

capabilities.name: Enforce Guardrails
capabilities.description: Verify attestation evidence for mandatory guardrails before signing off a release.

guardrail_ids.description: Guardrail identifiers the release must satisfy

attestations.description: Evidence bundle produced by the owning team

validation_report.description: Pass/fail per guardrail with escalation notes

guardrails.description: Require two independent reviewers for every production release recommendation.
Do not authorize deploys when observability detections are degraded for any critical dataplane.
